PropertyList.title: ZF Navy free balloon

key.name: W
key.desc: Weigh-off to 10% of current weight by dropping ballast. (Takes about 10 seconds and only works on ground.)

PropertyList.line: 2. Drop ballast until the balloon starts ascending.
1. Carefully valve off gas until rate off ascent starts to decrease.
2. When the balloon starts to descend drop ballast.
3. Never let the balloon gain too much momentum in either direction.
